item.title: Rice in Italy
item.description: 1 Rice in Italy 2 Searching Open Data 2.1 Agricultural data from Regione Lombardia 2.2 Shapefiles of Italy on ISTAT 2.3 Data from Enterisi 3 Conclusions 1 Rice in Italy It has been a while that, for work and for personal interest, I wanted to explore Italian rice production. In Northern Italy rice is a very important crop and a very important food.
